Subjects: Doomsday, songs of; carols, of Doomsday
_description: A song on Doomsday — four quatrains and burden: ‘Hay hay take goode hede wat you say’

Bridgewater.First Lines: A doums day we schull y-seeFadere and sone…
Bridgewater.Note: On the back of a parchment indenture.
Bridgewater.Editions:
Historical Manuscripts Commission, Fourth Report, with
                Appendix.
         (1874): App., 316.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 244; 1977, 216.
